fields.name: Primitivo Salento Torcicoda
fields.description: Torcicoda is a wine produced by Tormaresca with Primitivo grapes coming from vines grown as sapling and spurred cordon at the Tenuta Maìme di S. Pietro Vernotico. The grapes were harvested just overdried during the first week of September. After crushing, maceration, managed with soft pumping over and delèstage, was continued for 15 days in stainless steel tanks. During this phase, the wines completed the alcoholic fermentation at a temperature not exceeding 26 ° C. After the vinification of the wine, the malolactic fermentation took place directly in French and Hungarian oak barrels, in which it was raised for about 10 months. A further period of 8 months of aging in bottle followed before being placed on the market. Characterized by an intense ruby ​​red color. It has fruity aromas of plum, blackberry and raspberry combined with the spicy ones of pepper, coffee and cocoa. On the palate it releases a soft, rich, pleasant and elegant flavor, of good intensity and persistence. Serve at a temperature of 18-20 ° C.

fields.name: Primitivo di Manduria
fields.description: This primitivo is a fruit driven sweeter primitivo with notes of darker berrys like cherry, raisin and blackberry. It's earthy and rustic

fields.name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
fields.description: Amarone is a rich, expressive red wine from the Veneto region of northeastern Italy. Its full name is Amarone della Valpolicella, and it's produced from a blend of grapes including Corvina, Corvinone, Rondinella, and (less commonly these days) Molinara.

fields.name: Corse
fields.description: Dry and well-balanced between fruity and mineral

fields.name: Tranoï Rouge
fields.description: A rich wine that takes you to thhe forest in Narnia in just a sip. Reminds you of colder weather by the water with some vanilla hints

fields.name: E Prove Red
fields.description: A smokey wine wih alot of dark berries

fields.name: Grains de Cocotte Chardonnay - Sauvignon
fields.description: A lot of floral, honey, citrus and green fruits on the nose. Really Interesting! There is a nice balance and blend between the freshness and minerality of the SB and the body of the Chardonnay.

fields.name: Côtes de Femme
fields.description: A cherry rosé filled with citrus flavours that goes to the drier palets

fields.name: Romance Rosé
fields.description: The summerrosé you need! I mineral touch at first that goes over to a smoth flavour. Goes amazing to seafood and just by it self!

fields.name: Zinfandel 770 Miles
fields.description: Very fruity aromas: sweet cherry jam, vanilla, milky chocolate, even flowers?; easy going wine, drink slightly chill, unbeatable price.

fields.name: Cabernet Sauvignon
fields.description: So smooth you could do the land speed record on it. Legs that go on for miles and miles. Everything else is paired down and minimal.

fields.name: Chardonnay Adulation
fields.description: Keep him moving in comfort all day with quality Nike crew socks.  arch support reinforced toe and heel cotton/polyester/spandex washable importedA typical USA Chardonnay with strong notes of butter, oak, butterscoth and cream. I am quite fond of this style and this is typical without going to any exaggeration.

fields.name: Chardonnay Lapis Luna
fields.description: Grapefruit, honey, and peach nose. Medium gold color. Medium full bodied, dry, hint of effervescence , medium high acidity. Starts with cream and apricot evolving grassy notes finishing with a hint of vanilla.

fields.name: Sugarloaf Mountain
fields.description: Inky in color with a short purple rim. Full bodied and bold with medium acidity. Dry and very fruity on the palate. Showing blackberries, raisins, dried figs, vanilla, cola, cedar, milk chocolates, tobacco, peppercorn, espresso, light vinaigrette and Mediterranean spices. This 9 year old Cabernet Sauvignon is showing nice complexity with a nice mouthfeel.

fields.name: Kung Fu Girl Riesling
fields.description: 100% Riesling - Tropical and Balanced Style White Wine - 12% ALC - Light Golden Color Fresh Ripe Peaches Floral Rich Lemony Citrus Grassy Medium Bodied Apricot Buttery Dry Balanced Racy Acidity Crisp Mineral Nectarine. Drive Finish Served w/ Scallop and Shrimp. Over Wild Rice and Raisins Also a nice Sipper slightly chilled Cheers and Enjoy

fields.name: Sofia Rosé
fields.description: Well balanced rose from Coppola winery in Monterey. Refreshing rose with hints of berries. No presence of minerals.

fields.name: Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore N.V.
fields.description: Another bottle of bubbles we had to celebrate. This is a crisp - great tasting - a bubbly delight. The Italians really do have some excellent fizz.

fields.name: Moscato N.V.
fields.description: Very fine long lasting bubbles with a lemon straw color. Sweet with a hint of tartness on the finish. Very classy tiffany blue color bottles Delightful.

fields.name: Asti N.V.
fields.description: On the nose apple pear yeast bread a hint of floral. On the palate same flavor as aromas with some honey sweet but not overly sweet.

fields.name: La Folie Sparkling Rosé N.V.
fields.description: Easy drinking, semi sweet, strong strawberry note, reminds me of a strawberry bubble gum.

fields.name: Aimery Crémant de Limoux Grande Cuvée 1531 N.V.
fields.description: Medium gold colour. On the nose pear, pie crust, chamomile, and a touch of honey. There's a sulphurous characteristic to the nose. Dry with a touch of RS, medium alcohol, medium acidity. Asian pear, gooseberry and raspberry on the lengthy palate. Decent complexity here.

fields.name: Cremant d'Alsace Brut Extra N.V.
fields.description: A charming blend of 60% Pinot Auxerrois, 20% Chardonnay, 15% Pinot Blanc, and 5% Pinot Noir. The Meyer-Fonné Crémant d'Alsace Extra Brut sees only a minimal dosage and sports an autolytic nose of biscuit, apples and lilting white flowers. On the palate, a very fine, delicate mousse is bolstered by moderate acidity and subtle creaminess. It has a large mineral foundation upon which this wine is built: it is all chalk and sea salt, and there is even a touch of dried thyme and dried lemon zest.

fields.name: Millésime Brut Champagne
fields.description: When your workday calls for a heavyweight tee, grab this long-sleeve one from Dickies and enjoy industrial-strength comfort from the brand you trust.  chest pocket tagless back neck taped neck and shoulder seams cotton washable importedThe bubbles are plentiful and constant all over the glass with long strings of tiny bubbles. Classy, tasty and great choice for a special occasion.

fields.name: Pfefferer
fields.description: This is a stunning dry Moscato, with a complex fruity bouquet which reminds of the best Gewurtztraminers.
